snippet: His power within his party has been unquestioned for decades, but in seeking to bring down Italy’s coalition government, he may encounter resistance.
abstract: Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, who has enjoyed unquestioned power within his center-right party for decades, may be facing dissent over his effort to bring down country's fragile coalition government; limits of Berlusconi's influence are expected to be revealed during no-confidence vote in Parliament.
lead_paragraph: His power within his party has been unquestioned for decades, but in seeking to bring down Italy’s coalition government, he may encounter resistance.

headline.main: Internal Dissent Imperils Berlusconi’s Long Reign Atop His Party
headline.print_headline: Internal Dissent Imperils Berlusconi’s Long Reign Atop His Party
